name: BALL!
description: Control a ball that's bouncing non-stop! Gain new powers and explore mysterious worlds! Puzzle platforming goodness at its finest! Do you have what it takes?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Q9550 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD4870 / Nvidia GTX280 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
